text: A general election was held on 11 June 1987 to elect all 650 members to the House of Commons of the United Kingdom. The Conservative Party won the election, winning 376 seats, and Margaret Thatcher stayed as Prime Minister for the third election in a row. The Labour Party won 20 more seats than the last election, mostly from the Conservatives. ==Sources== * * * * * * * Category:1987 in Europe Category:1980s elections in the United Kingdom Category:United Kingdom general elections
title: 1987 United Kingdom general election
